name: Verdura
description:
Growing flowers is rewarding, but the magic just does not happen. You have to show patience, perseverance and above all care!

Renowned flower expert Bidwi il-Zahra gives these suggestions so as to see these flowers bloom!

Lotus: This flower needs lots of care and attention, might need to wait a whole deal - You can only plant it when it calls to your attention, and when it does, be sure to. Trust me, you'll know.

Vines: Not sure why you're growing vines, buddy. During my waking hours, I have not once seen them do anything. But hey, watching walls dry is a hobby, right?

Carnation: It's not even a carnation! Then again, I'm not even a real farmer, so what would I know. I've just been paid to tell you "o figlio pozzi", because this game's language profile can't seem to decide where it wants to be.

(Bidwi il-Zahra might eventually give you more tips on different flowers. The menu sure has space for it.)
